text: Kempen is a town in Germany. It is about northwest of DÃ¼sseldorf, and east of Venlo. It was once a center of textile making, silk, cotton, and linen. Kempen can also refer to a different town that used to be part of Germany but in 1920 was given to Poland and now has a Polish name. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Viersen (district)
title: Kempen, Germany
